text: Hontōni arrā no omoto no oshie wa, isurāmu (omo no ishi ni fukujū, kie suru koto)dearu. Keiten o sadzuke rareta hitobito ga, chishiki ga kudatta nochi ni ai arasou no wa, tada kare-ra no ma no netami karadearu. Arrā no shirushi o kyohi suru mono ga areba, arrā wa hontōni seisan ni jinsokude ara reru
